snippet: The company has donated money to help pay salaries for conservators working to repair Giorgio Vasari’s wood-panel paintin, which was damaged in a flood in 1966.
abstract: The company has donated money to help pay salaries for conservators working to repair Giorgio Vasari’s wood-panel paintin, which was damaged in a flood in 1966.

headline.main: Prada to Aid Restoration of Vasari's 'Last Supper'
